snippet.title: Operation Octo DEMO Trailer - Steam Tower Defense Festival
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2503550/Operation_Octo/
(DEMO also available in Arabic and Turkish)

Join our Discord: https://discord.com/invite/h87PpApxje

This second trailer created for the upcooming Steam TD Fest (July 29th, 2024) features a grand new biome - Toxic Wasteland! 

Dr. Odin, a hyper-intelligent octopus, is on a conquest against sunken skeletons. High-tech turrets are at his aid: Pistol Shrimp! Navy Seal! Death Ray! Deploy ’em, guard ’em, and collect more of ’em! Travel across unique biomes and put the dead to rest. 

Operation Octo is an underwater-themed Action Tower Defense game where you have an in-game avatar running around. The game differs from traditional TD games as it incorporates elements of Bullet Hell - As your line of defense wears down, things quickly turn into a game of survival where you scamper around dodging enemy attacks.
